channel.title: SigNoz
channel.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool powered by OpenTelemetry. Get APM, logs, traces, metrics, exceptions, & alerts in a single tool.

item.title: Technical Architecture
item.description: Learn about the technical architecture of SigNoz, including components like OpenTelemetry Collector, ClickHouse, Query Service, Frontend, and Alert Manager.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: What's Signoz
item.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool that unifies traces, metrics, and logs, providing a comprehensive solution for monitoring and troubleshooting issues in your applications.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: SigNoz MCP Server
item.description: Learn about SigNoz MCP Server integration for enhanced observability.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Monitor your ECS Fargate launch type
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Meter Explorer
item.description: Monitor and control observability costs with SigNoz Meter Explorer. Drill deeper into meter metrics with powerful query capabilities and gain actionable insights for cost optimization.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Cost Meter
item.description: Monitor and control observability costs with SigNoz Cost Meter. Gain comprehensive insights into your telemetry data consumption across logs, traces, and metrics with actionable cost optimization recommendations.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)
